name: Pastrami On Rye
description: My entry for the E1M1 Game Jam. I had a lot of fun messing around with the engine and ended up making 5 levels that are very different from each other. If you're having any issues with a level I included a Hint section in the README file. This is my first game jam so let me know if you liked it or what you found frustrating, thanks for playing my game! -Brian
